text: Chilandanyo cha aŵala ŵaakutolaga ipanje yao petala lya Allah, chili chisawu lusongolo lumpepe lwalukopwesye masache nsano nagaŵili, mwisache lililyose nikuŵa mwana songolo syakwana lichila, Allah ni akun'jonjechesyaga jwansachile, soni Allah ni Jwakwanila kusyene (ku iwumbe Yakwe), Jwakumanyilila nnope
